info.about: I am an undergraduate student at SRM Intitute of Science & Technology, pursuing a bachelorâ€™s degree in technology with specialization in Software Engineering. Currently, my research revolves around quantum key distribution protocols and error correction techniques. I am actively involved in investigating Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) under the mentorship of Dr. Gayathri M. Additionally, I contribute to the Machine Learning division at [NextTech Lab](https://nexttechlab.club), leveraging my expertise to explore the intersection of quantum computing and machine learning.
info.name: Vaishnav Manoj
info.footer: Quantum leaps in ML, fueled by [recursive](/) exploration, unlock the universe's potential.

data.title: Research Intern | Quantum Computing Lab
data.location: SRM Institute of Science & Technology, Chennai
description: Currently focused on developing an efficient method for data protection using Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) protocols.
Engaged in the development of a Quantum Key Distribution protocol utilizing Qiskit and IBM Quantum Experience's Quantum Computers for practical implementation.
Guided by Dr. Gayathri, Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at SRMIST, for insightful advice and direction.

data.title: Quantum Teleportation
description: Implemented the Quantum Teleportation algorithm using Qiskit and IBM Quantum Experience.
Used the IBM Quantum Experience to simulate the quantum teleportation circuit and visualize the results.

data.title: Hamiltonian Simulation
description: Implemented the Hamiltonian Simulation algorithm using Qiskit and IBM Quantum Experience.
Used the IBM Quantum Experience to simulate the Hamiltonian Simulation circuit and visualize the results.

data.title: NextTech Lab
description: Contributing to the Machine Learning division at NextTech Lab, leveraging my expertise to explore the intersection of quantum computing and machine learning.
Currently working on a project that involves the development of a Quantum Machine Learning model using Qiskit and IBM Quantum Experience.

data.title: Data Science Community
description: Leading the Data Science division at NextTech Lab, where I am responsible for organizing workshops, webinars, and hackathons to promote the culture of Data Science and Machine Learning among students.
Conducting workshops on various topics such as Data Analysis, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.

data.title: Google Developer Student Clubs
description: Leading the Machine Learning division at Google Developer Student Clubs, where I am responsible for organizing workshops, webinars, and hackathons to promote the culture of Machine Learning among students.
Conducting workshops on various topics such as Data Analysis, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.
